university_name: Cornell University - College of Agriculture & Life Sciences (CALS)
faculties_accepted: College of Agriculture and Life Sciences (CALS)
module_restrictions: Enrollment permission is often subject to class size limitations, the consent of instructors, and demonstrated academic qualifications in the form of prerequisites. Some courses require one or many prerequisites.
visa_info: All students are advised to apply for the necessary visa immediately after they receive the official offer letter/email from their host university.
accommodations_info: On-campus housing is not usually available for incoming exchange students. Exchange Housing Program and Off-Campus Housing are options.
cost_of_living: For more information on financial matters, please refer to the following link. Please keep in mind tuition fees are waived for exchange students. https://finaid.cornell.edu/cost-attend
university_description: Cornell University is a private Ivy League research university in Ithaca, NY, USA with a focus on agriculture, life sciences, and related fields.
location_cost_of_living: Ithaca, NY has a relatively high cost of living compared to other cities in the USA.
location_weather: Ithaca has a continental climate, meaning cold winters and warm summers.
location_description: Ithaca is a small, but vibrant city located in the Finger Lakes region of New York state. It is known for its natural beauty, parks, and gorges.
location_crime: Ithaca is generally seen as a safe city. However, like any city, it is important to take precautions.
location_transportation: There is a free bus service that runs in Ithaca, as well as taxi and ride-sharing services.
location_halal: Halal food options are available in Ithaca, but may be limited.
location_vegetarian: Vegetarian food options are available in Ithaca, and there are several vegetarian and vegan restaurants.
